root.name: LMNO
root.description: OverviewLMNO is the codename of a first-person parkour game that was in development at Electronic Arts in collaboration with Steven Spielberg. However, the game was cancelled before any significant details were released. As for the reason for the cancellation, Jake Kazdal, one of the developers who worked on LMNO for two years, was quoted on an October 2010 podcast as saying:â€œThere was some rival game stuff that may or may not have come out of EA that was basically the same thing minus some of the stuff we were doing. There was just a lot of politics."LMNO characters were to include a secret agent and a female alien.
